TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ValueSerializer extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi abstract ValueSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 为从对象表示形式进行序列化定义转换行为的抽象类。

span.span: Abstract class that defines conversion behavior for serialization from an object representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换器为序列化返回的字符串必须不太大，并且转换器必须始终为特定值返回相同字符串。The string a converter returns for serialization must be loss-less and the converter must always return the same string for a particular value. 如果从) 派生的类型转换器 ( 在其字符串输出实现中不满足这些要求 `ConvertTo` ，则 必须声明自定义。If a type converter (derived from ) does not meet these requirements in its `ConvertTo` implementations for string output, a custom must be declared. 要么 应满足要求，要么应 将 null 与类型相关联。Either the should meet the requirements, or a null should be associated with the type. 通过应用特性与类型相关联 。A is associated with a type by applying the attribute. 如果为 null，则 表示应忽略对象图中的转换到字符串转换的类型转换器。A null indicates the type converter should be ignored for convert-to-string conversions from the object graph. > [!IMPORTANT] > 的实现 应避免引发异常。Implementation of should avoid throwing exceptions. 引发的任何异常都可能终止序列化。Any exceptions thrown could terminate serialization. 对于 ，其 api 与 适用于 。 for a and its APIs is analogous to for a . 事实上， 继承 。In fact, inherits . 调用派生类 API 时，调用方 (通常是序列化程序进程) 传递可能提供某些服务的上下文。When a derived class API is called, the caller (typically a serializer process) passes a context that may provide certain services. 由于一般的指导， 不能引发异常。Because of the general guidance that a must not throw exceptions. 未能从上下文返回特定服务也必须不会引发任何异常。Failure to return a particular service from the context must also not throw any exceptions. 在 .NET Framework 的以前版本中，此类存在于 WPF 特定的程序集 WindowsBase 中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在中 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ， 为 system.exception 程序集。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml).

span.span: Returns an exception to throw when a conversion cannot be performed.

span.span: An object for the exception to throw when a conversion cannot be performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `throw`此方法不会调用实际关键字，因此典型用法 `throw GetConvertFromException` 与) 提供的参数 (。The actual `throw` keyword is not invoked by this method, therefore the typical usage is `throw GetConvertFromException` (with parameters provided). 返回的特定异常为 ，并 `value` 传入异常消息。The specific exception returned is , with `value` passed in the exception message. 用法的模式与中的异常实用工具的模式相同 。The pattern for usage is the same as for exception utilities in .

summary.span: 通过传递属性的 CLR 属性描述符，获取为属性声明的 。

returns.span: 与指定属性相关联的序列化程序。

May return .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于属性，或用作属性值的类型的，通过对 属性或类型声明应用特性来指示。A for a property, or for a type that is used as the value for a property, is indicated by applying the attribute on the property or type declaration. 方法是一个实用工具方法，该方法可读取 CLR 类型系统信息并基于属性返回新的 类（如果在属性上找到），或者如果在属性的类型上找到，则返回。The method is a utility method that reads the CLR type system information and returns a new class based on the attribute if found on the property, or then if found on the property's type. `null`如果不存在此类序列化程序，则可能返回。`null` might be returned if no such serializer exists. `null`如果类型或属性有意使用 null 值进行属性化，则也可能会返回 。`null` might also be returned if a type or property is deliberately attributed with a null-value . 支持的另一种模式 是返回内部 `TypeConverterValueSerializer` 类，这是一个 包装并将 `Convert` 方法转换为 `Convert*String` 使用类型的输入调用的 (实例的方法， 并转换为 。Another mode that supports is returning the internal `TypeConverterValueSerializer` class, which is a implementation that wraps a and translates the `Convert` methods to `Convert*String` methods (for instance is called with input of the type, and translates to . 仅在满足以下所有条件的情况下才执行此操作：This is done only in cases where all of the following are true: - 在 相关属性或相关属性的类型上找到。A is found on the relevant property, or the relevant property's type. - 指定的 可成功构造。The indicated can be successfully constructed. - 返回 `true` ，称为引用 类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. - 返回 `true` ，称为引用 类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. - 返回 `true` ，称为引用 类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. > [!NOTE] > 下面是一些特殊情况： 类型返回 ; 类型返回内部但函数序列化程序 (`StringValueSerializer`) 。The following are special cases: types return a ; types return an internal but functional serializer (`StringValueSerializer`).

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过对类型声明应用特性来指示类型的 。A for a type is indicated by applying the attribute on the type declaration. 方法是一个实用工具方法，可读取 CLR 类型系统信息，并根据属性返回新的 类（如果在指定的上找到） `type` 。The method is a utility method that reads the CLR type system information and returns a new class based on the attribute if found on the specified `type`. `null`如果不存在此类序列化程序，则可能返回。`null` might be returned if no such serializer exists. `null`如果类型有意使用 null 值进行属性化，则也可能会返回 。`null` might also be returned if a type is deliberately attributed with a null-value . 支持的另一种模式 是返回内部 `TypeConverterValueSerializer` 类，这是一个 包装并将 `Convert` 方法转换为 `Convert*String` 使用类型的输入调用的 (实例的方法， 并转换为 。Another mode that supports is returning the internal `TypeConverterValueSerializer` class, which is a implementation that wraps a and translates the `Convert` methods to `Convert*String` methods (for instance is called with input of the type, and translates to . 仅在满足以下所有条件的情况下才执行此操作：This is done only in cases where all of the following are true: - 在上找到了 `type` 。A is found on `type`. - 指定的 可成功构造。The indicated can be successfully constructed. - 返回 `true` ，称为引用 类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. - 返回 `true` ，称为引用 类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. - 返回 `true` ，称为引用 类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. > [!NOTE] > 下面是一些特殊情况： 类型返回 ; 类型返回内部但函数序列化程序 (`StringValueSerializer`) 。The following are special cases: types return a ; types return an internal but functional serializer (`StringValueSerializer`).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载不依赖于 CLR 类型系统中所报告的属性，而是使用 `context` 作为服务，并调用服务的实现 。Rather than relying purely on attributes reported in the CLR type system, this overload uses the `context` as a service, and calls the service's implementation of . 实现通常还依赖于 `descriptor` ，但可能实现某些上下文的特殊行为。The implementation would typically also rely on the `descriptor`, but might implement special behavior for certain contexts. 当调用方具有服务的可用时，应调用此方法 。This method should be called when the caller has an available from a service. 这将确保为 特定上下文返回正确的。This will ensure that the correct is returned for the specific context. 如果上下文 `null` 从指定的中返回 `descriptor` ，或如果指定的上下文为 `null` ，则行为与调用 重载相同。If the context returns `null` from its for your specified `descriptor`, or if the context you specify is `null`, then behavior is identical to calling the overload.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取 引用的类型的枚举。

span.span: Gets an enumeration of the types referenced by the .

returns.span: 此序列化程序所转换的类型。

span.span: The types converted by this serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换应包含在返回的枚举中的任何类型。Any types a converts should be included in the returned enumeration. 这允许序列化程序确保反序列化程序具有此序列化程序所转换的类型的足够信息。This allows a serializer to ensure a de-serializer has enough information about the types this serializer converts. 重写此方法是一种高级方案。Overriding this method is an advanced scenario. 仅当您实现的系统中的 CLR 类型系统所有者属性关系可用于 XAML 架构上下文时，才需要重写。Overriding should only be necessary if you are implementing a system where CLR type system ownertype-property relationships available to a XAML schema context do not report enough information. ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统实现了一个重写的内部值序列化程序， 因为某个依赖属性具有可添加所有者的概念。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system implements an internal value serializer that overrides because a dependency property has a concept that it can have added owners. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]表达式也具有特殊的内部处理。expressions also have special internal handling.
